main.*:
'''Aunt Phylis''' is the late aunt of [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Monica Geller]].

She is mentioned in "[[The One Where Nana Dies Twice]]", when Ross (thinking [[Althea|Nana]] was dead at the time) said Nana will be with Pop-pop and Aunt Phylis now. Monica had no recollection of her dying. After asking Ross, he said "Yeah... for like six years," Monica responded "Where was I?"
